document_data.mainbody:
Khalreshaar was an interloper goddess in the elven pantheon, aspect of Mielikki. Believed by half-elves to be the daughter of Silvanus and Hanali Celanil, and as such, the first truly half-elven deity. Khalreshaar was Mielikkis name on Evermeet and served Rillifane Rallathil.
She was originally a human druid before being magically transferred to Arvandor by the Seldarine. She was friend with the elves and even helped them to fight against a local human warlord. His soldiers slew her.
